Task 1 - Sequences

1. Create a vector and print the vector x (in ascending order)
```{r}
(x <- seq(from = 0, to = 40, by = 2))
```

2. Create a vector and print the vector y
```{r}
(y <- sample(x))
```

3. The values of x and y agree on the following positions:
```{r}
length(which(x == y))
which(x == y)
```
